extendedInfo.description: AWARD WINNING FLASHCARD APP!! Top 100 app on Amazon!Never buy flashcards again! This app allows you to make a set of flashcards and view them in either a simple format or use them in a game. The app also allows you to add additional cards to the card sets that you have already made. Create unlimited cards, and group them by topics. Have fun with it!If you love our app help support our development efforts and buy the ad-free version.Your flash card decks are automatically synced to the cloud! Search and download other people's flash card decks and edit them as you choose! Moving devices? Upgrading to our pro version? No worries, take your flash card decks with you! Editing downloaded flash card decks only affects your local copy and not the deck on the cloud.Please leave us a good review if you like our app =)Click on a card in any of the view modes, edit, delete, and save! Shuffle your cards using the options menu. Hundreds of new downloadable flash cards set available each day!NEW! Shuffle your flash cards using the options menu.

reviews.title: Close to being 5
reviews.comment: Loved it up to the time i needed to add something to a group. Im not redoing all them just to keep them in one group
reviews.author: Judy M

reviews.title: How can i share flashcards?
reviews.comment: I can\'t seem to find how to share and download other flashcards as you have said in you description. Please help. Thanks! I really like this app.
reviews.author: Alexa Eline Tajud

reviews.title: Very Disappointing
reviews.comment: There was no way to edit groups of saved cards   Cards didn\'t transfer from the trial version to the pro version   I am just glad that I hadn\'t spent too much time creating cards before realizing this.
reviews.author: Tony Romani

reviews.title: No transfer!  S4
reviews.comment: I entered ALL multiplication up to 25 X 25 then upgraded to pro to get rid of adds and lost all 625 entries!  Need a way to transfer from free to pro! Aslo need a way to delete downloaded topics. How do I download my cards to transfer to pro? Not working on S4 Will re-rate when fixed.
reviews.author: Six Blade

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Great app. Only concern is that I cannot add new notes to a topic after exiting the app.
reviews.author: George Harrington

reviews.title: Serves it\'s purpose
reviews.comment: I\'m a nursing student, tons of memorization...... this allows you to categorize topics to study specifics....  It can be tedious to put in a lot of information on a tablet but I like the Apple... I purchased the pro version to use amongst devices and I can\'t awh n to like my galaxy tan and note 2.....   Edition on Ann email response from the creator.....
reviews.author: Jarreau Miree

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I have been using this app a lot and it is really convenient. However, I would recommend an edit feature that actually saves your edits (right now when I fix a misspelled word on one of my notes and hit the save button it doesn\'t save it). And possibly an option for different backgrounds? I figure that would be a neat feature.
reviews.author: Nicole Rossell

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Very confusing. I need something I can use for school and to study for my regents
reviews.author: Brianna Miller

reviews.title: Not working-Samsung Galaxy Ace
reviews.comment: I can open the app and create a quiz, but every time I try to open the quiz the app force closes! Please help!!
reviews.author: Jay Lakhani

reviews.title: Very happy now
reviews.comment: Thank you for updating. Very good app now
reviews.author: BAYLEE WELLINGTON

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great App! This makes memorization easy!
reviews.author: Zev Persellin

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: Is there a way to edit the flash cards that you\'ve already made??
reviews.author: Ambra Roberts

reviews.title: The bomb
reviews.comment: Best flash card app ever it does everything. Never crashes. I give it an 11 on a scale of 1 to 10
reviews.author: brad sims

reviews.title: Adverts are too intrusive
reviews.comment: Looks nice and is  easy to use but ads pop up every couple of seconds and are distracting enough to make it more or less useless. Uninstalling and looking elsewhere.
reviews.author: John Noonan

reviews.title: Simple and useful
reviews.comment: Great study aid. Simple to use and straight to the point.
reviews.author: Jeremy Hunt

reviews.title: DO NOT INSTALL
reviews.comment: Ads every 5 seconds can\'t study it\'s bull crap
reviews.author: Dannielle Collins

reviews.title: Ew.
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t even work, Sends directly back to app store when you click anything.
reviews.author: Andrea Corrine

reviews.title: Oh well.
reviews.comment: I really wanted to use this app. Response from developer had me sold and confident. Upon download I would enter a name tap create and....nothing but an error I could report. Oh well. Thanks.
reviews.author: Cassandra E. Petty
